name: Bolt
title: bolt.new
payoff: Build full-stack web and mobile apps
shortDescription: Bolt enables developers to prompt, run, edit, and deploy full-stack web and mobile applications with ease. It's designed for developers looking to streamline their development process without sacrificing control over their projects. An example use case is a startup quickly prototyping and deploying an MVP to validate their business model.
pros: Supports both web and mobile platforms
